Title: Former Senegalese President Macky Sall's barely concealed ambition to become UN Secretary-General
Subhead: Since leaving office in 2024, the former head of state has traveled back and forth between conventions and international conferences, amplifying Africa's voice and fueling his desire to succeed Antonio Guterres at the helm of the United Nations.

Title: 'France has lost all budgetary credibility'
Subhead: The downgrade of France's sovereign credit rating by the Fitch and S&P agencies highlights just how little confidence remains in the French government's promises to restore public finances, both in financial markets and within the European Union,  writes Le Monde's Eric Albert in his column.

Title: Joyful and massive 'No Kings' protests against Trump reveal a sense of powerlessness
